title: [Bad] Tinder can terminate your account at anytime without notice or reason.

tosdr.tldr: Tinder may terminate or suspend your account at any time without notice, or for any other reason, with or without cause, and at its sole discretion. Upon such termination or suspension, you will not be entitled to any refund of unused fees for in app purchases. They are not required to disclose the reason for the termination or suspension of your account.
